casebody.data:
Thomas A. PORTER, Plaintiff-Appellant v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 05-5105. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. April 6, 2006.

Before SCHALL, GAJARSA, and DYK, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
